text.language: Pauloc v~bwk m~Pen[oic I/couc Pi,~rictoc pia~poctoloc etyahem v/e~tauyasf e~pihisennofi n~te V].
Paul, the servant of our Lord Jesus Christ, called to be an apostle, appointed to the Gospel of God.

language.div: Paulus, hamba Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus, dipanggil sebagai rasul, dipilih untuk memberitakan Injil Allah.

text.language: بولس عبد يسوع المسيح الرسول المدعو المفرز لبشرى الله.
